title: Four shot at Haw River sports bar
content:
Hide caption Four people were shot early Wednesday morning at the Jet Sports Bar & Lounge in Haw River. Sam Roberts / Times-News
Four people were shot early Wednesday morning at a Haw River sports bar.
According to a press release, at 2:09 a.m., Haw River police responded to a shooting at the Jet Sports Bar at 1003 W. Main St. Officers found four people shot.
One victim was transported to Duke University Medical Center in Durham while the other three were transported to the Alamance Regional Medical Center.
The Alamance County Sheriff’s Office, the North Carolina State Bureau of Investigation, Graham Police Department, the North Carolina Alcohol Law Enforcement and Burlington Police Department are assisting in the investigation.
Witnesses at the scene stated one, possibly two black men were involved in the shooting.
The investigation is continuing. No arrests have been made at this time.
Anyone with information is asked to contact the Haw River Police Department at 578-4141 or CrimeStoppers at 229-7100.
